title: Not able to play on NA server
body: anyone else having problems trying to start a game? I am not even able to press the play button,

replies.body:
> If you guys are experiencing a RADS error and your play button in the client is grayed out, try flushing your DNS. I just had the problem myself.
> 
> First, close out of league and open Command Prompt (Windows) by searching for "cmd" in your start menu (without quotations, obviously.)
> 
> Next, when the Command Promp appears, type "ipconfig /flushdns" (again, without the quotations.)
> 
> After you've done that, it should immediately flush your dns. Open League, log in, and check to make sure that functionality is restored to your Play button once more.
> 
> Lemme know if this helped, my dudes.

Just copy-pasting this from a thread I made here to help out. Let me know if it helps!

Glad to see that flushing your DNS fixed it! Configuring your DNS is also a step in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so you can always check there for fixes as well.
